CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper November 23, 1957, pg. A1, reads: "Threat Brings Arrest - Helen Altiere (center), of Whitney Terrace, was arrested in Alderman Harry B. Fitzgerald's office Monday night after she threatened to use a gun to kill a man who had filed a criminal information against his girlfriend, who came to the hearing with Helen Altiere. Seeking legal aid, the arrested woman, who posted a $1,000 bond, appealed to Atty. Henry R. Smith Jr. (standing left), who was at the squire's office on another case. Constable Bud Aidisey (seated) with two other constables, made the arrest. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Crowd, including Atty. Henry R. Smith on left and Constable Bud Aidisey seated in foreground, gathered around newly arrested Helen Altiere in office of Alderman Harry B. Fitzgerald
